extendedInfo.description: The Kids school (English Version) app consists of english alphabets, birds, directions,animals to learn and play with them. There are over hundred words to teach your kids. There is even a quiz game, memory game, match game within to train and monitor your kids. Make the best time for them. Kids will love going to schools later.Give your kids an experience of a school goer while @ home. Have some fun and valuable time with your kids.Don't miss having some fun time with your kidsSupport both smartphones and tablets.Keywords: The kids school, Kids, School, Educational, Games, Preschool, Child, english, Vowels, Consenants, English, Translator, Learn, Teach, Quiz, Games, Monitor, Love, Children,   School, Kindergarten, fun, Preschool-aged, Skills, birds, animals, directions, english alphabets, kids english, play.

reviews.title: Very nice UI
reviews.comment: Its great app for all kids learning and playing.

reviews.title: Elegant & excellent
reviews.comment: The app is very easy to use. It\'s very interactive. My girl like it alot. I recommend this for all kids...
